name: wishfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that imagines or discusses what you wish or hope for, especially when this is very unlikely to happen: They expected a crowd of 10,000 people to show up to the concert, but that figure turned out to be wishfully optimistic. He wants to play in the World Cup, but he knows that he is thinking wishfully.
More examplesFewer examples"Do you think you might want to go out for ice cream later?" he asked wishfully. He wishfully exaggerated the extent of his knowledge in his conversations with journalists.
